Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's truly a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their experience. For a limited time, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $150. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as the regular price is significantly higher. Don't hesitate to seize this chance to elevate your life with our top-tier product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
